questions.question: Can we do 1-hr (weekly) activities for each Skills, Physical Recreation and Voluntary Service concurrently?

choices.answer: No, only one Section per week
Can you give me the answer?

questions.question: Activities undertaken in EmPOWER sessions can be counted towards the DofE, after one has been registered on ORB
Sam registered for Bronze. After 2months, he decided to go for Silver. Can he convert from Bronze to Silver?

choices.answer: Maybe ask for discount for the registration fees?
Nay, he will register again for Silver

questions.question: For DofE,can I complete the 1-hr weekly requirement for Skills, then only move on to Phy. Recreation, then Vol. Service?

choices.answer: Nay, just do 3 hours every week

questions.question: The ORB is used by participant to record each Section's goal, log each weekly activity and upload supporting evidence.
